Question
========

There are three small populations of students in different STEM subjects, each with an average of 30. Below are the values in each population:_____. I 10, 50\ II 10, 20, 30, 40, 50. III 20, 30, 40. \ Below you can see different distributions of the sample mean. Which graph below belongs to population I?

![](uva-sample-mean-1285-nl-graph01.png)

Answerlist
----------

* A
* B
* C

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* A: Incorrect
* B: Correct
* C: Incorrect
